name: sort number list
help: Sorts the values of a number list.

value.description: return the closest value to this one, above and below in the list

original indexes.description: map from new to old indices

reverse indexes.description: map from old to new indices

value below.description: value in the list closest below given value

value above.description: value in the list closest above given value

below index.description: index in the original list, of the 'below' value;  -1 if value < lowest list value

above index.description: index in the original list, of the 'below' value;  -1 if value > highest list value
